item.description: Cape cod Canal Walk is a beautiful excursion. It's fun to walk along the canal and watch the beautiful boats cruise by. For those interested in car pooling please indicate so in your rsvp. I can offer 3 seats in my car. After the walk we can have lunch in Plymouth Harbor at one of their seafood restaurants. As the date approaches I'll update where we can all meet once we arrive at the Canal area.

group.name: The Chestnut Hill Walking Meetup Group

item.name: CAPE COD CANAL WALK
